description: This four-ingredient roast pork belly recipe with the crispiest crackling is so simple to make. The juicy, tender meat will make everyone swoon.
name: Pork Belly With Crispy Crackling Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.33 cup beetroot & balsamic relish, to serve

recipeInstructions.text: Pat pork rind dry with paper towels. Place on a plate. Refrigerate, uncovered, for 4 hours or overnight, if time permits. Remove pork from fridge and stand to bring to room temperature. Score at 1cm intervals.
Rub salt flakes into rind. Preheat oven to 240째C/220째C fan-forced.
Using paper towels, pat dry any excess moisture from rind. Drizzle with oil.

Place pork, rind-side up, in a roasting pan. Bake for 45 minutes. Reduce temperature to 220째C/200째C fan-forced, then bake for a further 45 minutes or until skin is golden and crispy. Set aside for 15 minutes to rest. Serve with beetroot and balsamic relish.
